item.title: Autotalk in my willows cutter banker
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

Check out SetTimeOut, I’m pretty sure it lets you call a procedure every so often. And the procedure could pick a random number, and each number corresponds to a phrase and then do case of to send the right phrase. That should keep you busy until someone else that actually knows what they are talking about can help you out.

Read full topic

item.title: Autotalk in my willows cutter banker
item.dc:creator: @martijntjuh martijntjuh
item.description:
@martijntjuh wrote:

heey every 1 i made a willow cutter banker its working fine but now i want to have a autotalker in it so it talk sometimes…for antiban and stuff but i dont know how u got to do that…can please some 1 help me??? ill post my script and if u wanna help me leme know
thanx

//////MARTIJNTJUHS first script!!!/////
//////its an willow cutter banker…/////
//////very special thanx to Cheeshunk and whiteshadow!!!/////
//////map facing ‘S’ and start in bank/////
///importenst thing!!!have fun!!!with doing nothing!!!////
///send errors to marta_sparta_martin_air@hotmail.com////
{.include srlsrl.scar}
{.include srlsrlskillwoodcutting.scar}
const
glvl=60; //level u wanna rich!

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=2;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:=0;
Players[0].Name :=‘jreio6i54o6j’
Players[0].Pass :=‘klereleier’;
Players[0].Nick :=‘eio’;
Players[0].Loc :=’’
Players[0].Active:=True;

Players[1].Name :=’’
Players[1].Pass :=’’;
Players[1].Nick :=’’;
Players[1].Loc :=’’
Players[1].Active:=True;
end;
procedure FindWcRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindQuiz;
FindScapeRune
FindMime
if (FindNewBox) then begin
OpenBox;
SolveBox;
wait(1000);
if (FindNewBox) then
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…’);
begin
FindHead;
SolveFrog;
if(FindFight)then
begin
SetRun(true)
RunAwayDirection(‘N’)
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
FindDemon;
FindName;
TalkToRand;
FindEnt(2633768);
FindWcRandoms;
end;
end;
end;

procedure towillows;
begin;
status(‘to willows!’)
SetRun(true)
mouse(710,111,1,2,true)
flag;
mouse(712,97,1,2,true);
flag;
wait(30000)
end;

procedure cutwillows;
var x,y,prevcount,a:integer;
begin
status(‘cutting willows!’)
prevcount:=invcount;
if FindObj(X,y,‘Chop down W’,2633768,10) then
begin
Mouse(x,y,10,5,true);
a:=0;
repeat
wait(1000);
a:=a+1;
if a=3 then break;
until(invcount>prevcount)
end;
end;

procedure tobank;
begin
status(‘going to bank!’)
SetRun(true);
mouse(575,79,1,2,true)
flag;
wait(30000)
mouse(599,80,1,2,true)
flag;
wait(5000)
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,5626855,566,20,752,166))Then
wait(500+random(200));
clickmouse(x,y,true)
end;
procedure bankit;
begin
status(‘banking all willows!’)
repeat
OpenBank3;
until(BankScreen)
wait(700+random(600))
Deposit(2,28,2);
end;

procedure banktrip;
begin
tobank;
bankit;
towillows;
end;

begin
Setupsrl;
declareplayers;
if not loggedin then
begin
LoginPlayer;
end else
begin
NickNameBMP:= CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick,UpChars);
end;
FindAxeHeadColor;
ChatsOff;
SetRun(true);
Face(‘S’)
towillows;
repeat
FindAxeHeadColor;
Face(‘S’)
cutwillows;
SrlRandomsReport;
if(invFull)then banktrip;
until (getskilllevel(‘woodcutting’)=glvl)
end.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 12, 2006, 03:59:31 AM[/size][hr]can some 1 help me???
